greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(Sum_{k>=0} (k!)^3 x^k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..181
mathematica: a[n_] := -Sum[(k!)^3*a[n - k], {k, n}]; a[0] = 1; Array[a, 15, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 15 2018 *)
nmax = 20; CoefficientList[Series[1/Sum[k!^3 * x^k, {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Dec 08 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 15 2018
